title: Grand Opening: Greece Private Pool Suites near Kefalonia's Trapezaki Beach with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinners
description: Be one of the first to discover idyllic island bliss at Celestial Hotel, superbly located just moments from the crystal blue waters of Trapezaki Beach in Greece. Embrace a stay miles away from reality and base yourself at this modern oasis tucked within the dense forest of Mousata. Become immersed in the rich Mediterranean culture through your tastebuds at the resort’s in-house fine dining destination Viola restaurant. Stretch your legs and wander along the sparking beaches within close reach, or find absolute rejuvenation with a treatment at the resort’s spa before retreating to a comfortable sunbed overlooking the pool.
offer_address: Trapezaki Beach Kefalonia Ionian Islands 281 00 Greece

title: Boutique Greek Island Paradise With Daily Breakfast and a Three-Course Dinner
description: Explore turquoise lagoons, hot springs and one of the world’s most photographed beaches on a romantic getaway to Kefalonia Grand Hotel on the Greek Island of Kefalonia. Includes daily breakfast, a three-course Mediterranean dinner, one complimentary cocktail each, return airport transfers and more.
